abstract: Sergey Brin and Vic Gundotra talk about Google+, the new Android phone, far-afield projects and memos that put Mr. Brin to sleep. Though incumbent social networks like Facebook have a clear advantage because users are already there, Mr. Gundotra said, Google has a different advantage: most people visit Google every day, so Google constantly has the chance to lure them to Google+.
snippet: Sergey Brin and Vic Gundotra talk about Google+, the new Android phone, far-afield projects and memos that put Mr. Brin to sleep. Though incumbent social networks like Facebook have a clear advantage because users are already there, Mr. Gundotra...

headline.main: Google+ Will Get New Features, and New Users, Executive Says
